Content: Xen Realms is looking for friendly mature adults to join our recently started Minecraft (1.12.2) server that uses the “Roguelike Adventures & Dungeons” modpack. We are looking for new members to come join our growing community and help us flourish! We are working on the community spawn area now that includes a vegetable garden and an Inn with some starter supplies to get you going. You will have to download the "Roguelike Adventures and Dungeons" modpack through Twitch. I do have a discord set up for chat. Please DM me if interested or would like more info. We look forward to seeing you!
